summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2839 for the improvement of Thirty-second Avenue Northeast from East Sixtieth Street to East Sixty-fifth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same; by constructing wooden curbs and gutters; by providing for the surface drainage and by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks, under Ordinance No. 34256, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
